item.description:
Let’s get together for a fun game of miniature golf at Mel’s Fun Way in Litchfield. After our strenuous workout we can relax and enjoy their home made Ice Cream. Then maybe we can check out what else is happening at the park. Take a look at all they offer in the way of FUN stuff http://www.melsfunwaypark.com …….and bring your suggestions. Go-karts and laser tag sounds pretty good to me.
For a Friday night I don’t see many activities posted. So let’s get out there and make something happen!

We’ll meetup between 7:45 and 8:00pm in front of the Ice Cream stand. It’s also the entrance to the mini golf course. I’ll be wearing my cap with a meetup pin on the back. We need at least 4 people, but I’m guessing they’ll be many more. Hope to see you there!
item.name: Last minute event – Miniature Golf in Litchfield
